Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent damage = 5
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
local touchedYet = false
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or touchedYet or hit.Name == "DragonXBowArrow" or hit.Parent.Name == "DragonHunterXBow" then return end touchedYet = true ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then HitSound:Play() humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end
newWeld = Instance.new("Weld") newWeld.Name = "ArrowWeld" newWeld.Part0 = hit newWeld.Part1 = ball --newWeld.C0 = ball.CFrame*hit.CFrame:inverse() --script.Parent.CFrame:inverse()*hit.CFrame newWeld.C1 = ball.CFrame:inverse()*hit.CFrame newWeld.Parent = hit
-- HitSound:Play() -- ball.Parent = nil --print("Hit Ground At: ") --print(ball.Position) end
ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
local i = 0 while i < 80 and not touchedYet do ball.ArrowGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(ball.Position, ball.Position+ball.Velocity)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, math.pi) wait(.1) i = i + 1 end
while i < 80 do wait(.1) i = i + 1 end
ball.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

-- 43645221 : Fired Bow -- 43645253 : Arrow
local Tool = script.Parent;
Tool.Enabled = true
--local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") local sparkColors = {Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Color3.new(0,1,0), Color3.new(0,0,1), Color3.new(1,1,0), Color3.new(1,0,1), Color3.new(0,1,1)}
function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = Instance.new("Part") local missileMesh = Tool.Handle.Mesh:Clone() missileMesh.Parent = missile missileMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=43645253"
Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=43645221" --littleSpark = spark:Clone() --littleSpark.Parent = missile --littleSpark.Color = sparkColors[math.random(1,#sparkColors)] --littleSpark.Color = Color3.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random())
if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*5 dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 5
-- convert to a 2D space deltaXZSquared = dPos.X*dPos.X + dPos.Z*dPos.Z deltaXZ = math.sqrt(deltaXZSquared) deltaY = dPos.Y
--[[print("dPos: ") print(dPos)
print("deltaY: ") print(deltaY)
print("deltaXZ: ") print(deltaXZ)]]--
-- pick a random medium angle (30-50 degrees) alpha = math.random()*math.pi/8 + math.pi/6 --alpha = math.pi / 4
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01) --missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20)
-- back-solve for the velocity required to hit the target point --gravity = 196.1643 gravity = 196.1643 numerator = -0.5*gravity*deltaXZSquared denominator = math.cos(alpha)*math.cos(alpha)*(deltaY - math.tan(alpha)*deltaXZ)
--print("numerator: ") --print(numerator) --print("denominator: ") --print(denominator)
if denominator == 0 then return end missileSpeed = math.sqrt(numerator / denominator) if missileSpeed > 300 then missileSpeed = 300 end vXZ = missileSpeed * math.cos(alpha) vY = missileSpeed * math.sin(alpha) vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaXZ vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaXZ missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) --[[print("missileSpeed: ") print(missileSpeed) print("vY: ") print(vY) print("vX: ") print(vX) print("vZ: ") print(vZ)]]--
--missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random() --missile.Shape = math.random(0,2)
-- missile.BottomSurface = 0 -- missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Name = "DragonXBowArrow" --missile.Reflectance = 1 --missile.Transparency = 0 missile.CanCollide = false
--local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") --force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) --force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass()*200,0) --force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
newBG = Instance.new("BodyGyro") newBG.cframe = CFrame.new(missile.Position, missile.Position+missile.Velocity) newBG.Name = "ArrowGyro" newBG.P = 10000 newBG.D = 1000 newBG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(newBG.P, newBG.P, newBG.P) newBG.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .3 confettiBang:Play() end end
function gunUp() --Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,.196, -.981) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.981, -.196)
for i = 1,20 do upAngle = math.cos(i*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin(i*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end end
function gunDown()
for i = 1,20 do upAngle = math.cos((20-i)*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin((20-i)*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end
--Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) end function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onEquip() -- Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) -- Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) -- Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -.75, 1.5) end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local reload = .3 --if (isTurbo(character)) then -- reload = .25 -- print("turbo") --end
-- gunUp() --for i = 1,25 do local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint --local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position) local lookAt = targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position --if (lookAt.magnitude > 1000) then lookAt = lookAt.unit * 1000 end fire(lookAt) --wait(.1) --end -- gunDown() wait(reload)
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=43645154"
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquip) script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)
